menu.name: gameplay
menu.desc: Change gameplay options for VS Impostor such as middlescroll, hitsounds...

checkbox.name: Middlescroll
checkbox.desc: If checked, centers the player's strums to the middle.

checkbox.name: Hide opponent notes
checkbox.desc: If checked, will make the opponent's notes invisible.

checkbox.name: Hitsounds
checkbox.desc: If checked, a tick sound will occur on every note hit.

menu.name: appearance
menu.desc: Change appearance options for VS Impostor such as flashing lights, jumpscares, camera movement...

checkbox.name: Disable Flashing Lights
checkbox.desc: If unchecked, there will be flashing lights in some songs. (MAY BE SENSITIVE FOR PEOPLE WITH EPILEPSY)

checkbox.name: Disable Screen Shake
checkbox.desc: If unchecked, screen shaking will occur in some songs.

checkbox.name: Disable Jumpscares
checkbox.desc: If unchecked, there will be jumpscares in certain songs.

checkbox.name: Disable Cam Movement
checkbox.desc: If checked, the camera will no longer move with the note's direction.
